Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.exceptions

package it.polimi.ingsw.model.exceptions
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.model
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.model.card
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.model.enums

  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    AlreadyUsedPositionException
    This exception is thrown when the user tries to place two cards on the same spot.
    CardNotFoundException
    This exception is thrown when the card the user wants to draw from the board does not exist.
    CostNotSatisfiedException
    This exception is thrown when the user tries to place a gold card without fulfilling its cost.
    EmptyException
    This exception is thrown when the user tries to draw from an empty deck.
    FullHandException
    This exception is thrown when the user draws a card already having 3 cards in his hand.
    FullLobbyException
    This exception is thrown when a user tries to join a lobby which is already full of players.
    GameNotStartedException
    This exception is thrown when the game tries to end without starting.
    InvalidCoordinatesException
    This exception is thrown when a player tries to place a card on a non-valid spot.
    JsonFileNotFoundException
    This exception is thrown when the JSON files necessary to run the game are not found
    NotEnoughPlayersException
    This exception is thrown when the game tries to start without being full.
    NotInTurnException
    This exception is thrown when a player tries to perform an action, such as place a card or draw one, without being in turn
    OccupiedCornerException
    This exception is thrown when a player tries to place a card on a corner which does not exist or that is already covered by another card.
    PlayerNotFoundException
    This exception is thrown when a player tries to send a message to another player who is not in the same lobby.
